changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Deactivating tests with a sample type of Free text
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.test set is_active='N' where id in (select t.id from clinlims.test t join clinlims.sampletype_test st on st.test_id = t.id join clinlims.type_of_sample ts on ts.id = st.sample_type_id where ts.description = 'Free text');

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Corrected spelling of Mycobacterium tuberculosis Drug Resistant test
changeSet.sql: UPDATE clinlims.test SET description=replace(description,'Mycobacterium tuberculosis Drug Resistant','Mycobacterium tuberculosis résistant'), reporting_description=replace(reporting_description,'Mycobacterium tuberculosis Drug Resistant','Mycobacterium tuberculosis résistant'), name=replace(name,'Mycobacterium tuberculosis Drug Resistant','Mycobacterium tuberculosis résistant') WHERE name='Mycobacterium tuberculosis Drug Resistant';

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Remove the UOM from the dictionary result for viral load
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.dictionary set dict_entry= replace(dict_entry, ' copies/ml', '') where dict_entry like 'Indetectable%';
